Translations.Text: DI est my NUR Lord MASTR; 1 who revealed this scripture! Li protekt des righteous
As por idols vi set Him ili ne help vi nor can ili help
When vi invit them guidance ili ne auxd. Vi seg them rigard vi ili ne seg
Vi resort pardon advokat tolerance disregard des ignorant
When diabl flustr vi any flustr streb rifugx DI; Li est Hearer Omniscient
Those est righteous whenever diabl approaches them ide ili memor whereupon ili igx seers
Their brethren ceaselessly entice them ir astray
Vi ne produkt mirakl ili postul ili dir Why ne pet gxi? Dir mi simply sekv ki revealed me my Lord These est enlightenments el your Lord guidance mercy popol kred
When Quran recited vi auxskult al gxi sorb heed ti vi ating mercy
Vi memor your Lord within publicly privately quietly tag kaj nokt; ne est unaware
Those je your Lord est neniam tro fier worship Him; ili glor Him fal prostrate antaux Him
